title: 2010/217/: Council Decision of 9 April 2010 appointing one Greek member and one Greek alternate member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
16.4.2010 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 96/7
COUNCIL DECISION
of 9 April 2010
appointing one Greek member and one Greek alternate member of the Committee of the Regions
(2010/217/EU)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the functioning of the European Union, and in particular Article 305 thereof,
Having regard to the proposal of the Greek Government,
Whereas:
(1) On 22 December 2009 and on 18 January 2010, the Council adopted Decisions 2009/1014/EU and 2010/29/EU appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions for the period from 26 January 2010 to 25 January 2015 (1).
(2) A member’s seat on the Committee of the Regions has become vacant following the end of the term of office of Mr Nikitas KAKLAMANIS. An alternate member’s seat has become vacant following the appointment of Mr Dimitris KALOGEROPOULOS as a member of the Committee of the Regions,
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed to the Committee of the Regions for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 25 January 2015:
(a) as member:
— Mr Dimitris KALOGEROPOULOS, Mayor of the City of Egaleo (change of mandate);
(b) as alternate member:
— Mr Dimitris MARAVELIAS, Mayor of Chaidari.
This Decision shall take effect on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussel, 9 April 2010.
For the Council
The President
M. Á. MORATINOS
(1)  OJ L 348, 29.12.2009, p. 22 and OJ L 12, 19.1.2010, p. 11.
